trans-unit.source: Provides information on connectors between activity designers that accessibility applications use to adjust an application's UI for users with impairments.
When using a freeform layout, activity designers are connected to each other using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> class.

The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorAccessibleObject> class is used to provide information on these connectors between activity designers that accessibility applications use to adjust an application's UI.
Also, you can use this class to customize the drawing when you derive a class from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>.

Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorAccessibleObject"></xref> class using an instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
An instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> which represents a connector between two activity designers on a workflow design surface.
Gets the location and size of the accessible object.
Rectangle containing location and size information for the accessible object
Retrieves the child object at the specified screen coordinates.
The horizontal screen coordinate.
The vertical screen coordinate.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorAccessibleObject"></xref> the child object at the given screen coordinates.
This method returns the calling object if the object itself is at the location specified.
Returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if no object is at the tested location.
Gets or sets the object name.
String value representing the name of the accessible object
Gets the parent of an accessible object.
Parent object for the accessible object
Gets the role of this accessible object.
The `AccessibleRole` property describes what kind of user interface element an object is.
If the control's role cannot be determined, the `AccessibleRole` property is set to `Default`.
One of the values of AccessibleRole.
